mapper.insert: insert into user_group(group_name, group_desc, created_by, created_on, updated_by, updated_on) values(#{groupName}, #{groupDesc}, #{createdBy}, #{createdOn}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedOn})
mapper.sql: ug.id as id, ug.group_name as groupName, ug.group_desc as groupDesc, ug.created_by as createdBy, ug.created_on as createdOn, ug.updated_by as updatedBy, ug.updated_on as updatedOn
mapper.select: SELECT FROM user_group ug order by ug.group_name asc
SELECT FROM user_group_approval uga inner join user_group ug on uga.user_group_id=ug.id where uga.user_data_id=#{value}
